<Text: Neigong, also spelled "nei kung", "neigung", or "nae gong"
Text: Neigong, also spelled "nei kung", "neigung", or "nae gong"
1:
--------------------
Text: Neigong:  Neigong practice is normally associated with the so-called "soft style", "internal" or neijia 內家 Chinese martial arts, as opposed to the category known as waigong 外功 or "external skill" which is historically associated with shaolinquan or the so-called "hard style", "external" or wàijiā 外家 Chinese martial arts.
Triplets:<Neigong practice
